name: remove_duplicates
description: Removes duplicate elements from a list while preserving the order. You can also specify a custom key function to determine whether two elements are considered duplicates, and control case sensitivity for string values.

lst.description: The input list, which can contain integers, strings, floats, etc.

key.description: A custom function to determine if two elements are duplicates. If not provided, the function uses the element itself.

case_sensitive.description: If True, string comparisons are case-sensitive. Defaults to True.
